app.title: AI Readiness Assessment
app.description: Assess your company's AI readiness level and get personalized recommendations

home.goalDescription: What are your main objectives for implementing AI in your organization?
home.goalPlaceholder: E.g., We want to automate our customer service processes and implement predictive analytics for sales forecasting...

expectationsList.evaluation: Comprehensive evaluation of your AI readiness

home.timeEstimate: This assessment takes approximately 15-20 minutes to complete

contextCard.title: AI Readiness Assessment
contextCard.description: Welcome to the AI Readiness Assessment tool! This will help you understand your organization's readiness for implementing AI.

steps.step2: Get an overview of your organization's readiness
steps.step4: Receive personalized recommendations for next steps
